mapper.select: SELECT cr.chat_room_name As chatRoomName, cr.room_owner AS ownerId, cr.joined_count As joinedCount FROM tb_chat_room cr JOIN tb_chat_member cm ON cr.chat_room_id = cm.chat_room_id WHERE cm.user_id = #{userId} AND cr.chat_room_type = 'CHAT' AND cr.room_status = 'Y' ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_chat_room cr JOIN tb_chat_member cm ON cr.chat_room_id = cm.chat_room_id WHERE cm.user_id = #{userId} AND cr.chat_room_type = 'CHAT' AND cr.room_status = 'Y'

SELECT cr.chat_room_name AS chatRoomName, cr.is_private AS isPrivate, cr.room_owner AS ownerId, cr.joined_count AS joinedCount, cr.room_capacity AS roomCapacity FROM tb_chat_room cr WHERE cr.chat_room_type = 'GAME' AND cr.room_status = 'Y' ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tb_chat_room WHERE chat_room_type = 'GAME' AND room_status = 'Y'
